offer_settings.coupon_offer: Receive a 15% discount off of all services.

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms:
<p>The GRUND RESORT Hotel is integrated in the peaceful countryside of eastern Krkonoše. The four-star hotel offers luxurious accommodation with a pleasant and friendly atmosphere. There are double rooms and luxury apartments which have been furnished by top Italian designers from the design studio Ferrari Pagani Tresoldi Architetti. The professional staff of the hotel&#8217;s restaurant will welcome you to its stylish interior or to a terrace overlooking the golf course and surrounding countryside. The restaurant is open for hotel guests, golfers, tourists and visitors from the surrounding area. The offer covers international cuisine, local specialities, and also seasonal dishes prepared from quality fresh ingredients. A new 18-hole golf course with first-class facilities is part of the resort. You can enjoy a game on the course, with a view of Krkonoše panorama, either in the company of friends or under the supervision of a PGA professional coach. The rugged landscape in the area around the resort offers numerous opportunities for relaxation and active rest. In the winter months, it is an ideal place for both down-hill and cross-country skiing. In summer, in addition to golf, you can enjoy horse riding, swimming, cycling or hiking.</p>
<p>Payment for services is required with a Diners Club card. Before visiting, please make a reservation. Take advantage of easy electronic reservation at the hotel.</p>
